column3: “Although my dealer dubbed the strain Alien Orange Cookies" I found it appropriate to write my review under "Orange Cookies" as leafly did not have "Alien."

column1: My bud (no pun intended) and I rolled two J's
column2: one for each of us. After the third hit I instantly felt insanely relaxed. By the time I finished the joint I was the happiest person there could be.

column1: Everything I saw made me happy and made me delve into life and h...”"

column3: “A friend once told me, Once you find it
column4: you'll just know it's 'the one.'" Strain after strain
column6: but nothing that really popped out at me. Until Orange Cookies. As already said numerous times
column8: and tastes like it smells. Exciting head/body combo. Goofy and happy
column10: then I'm swerving like I just had to many drinks. Uplifting and enchanting like a goo...”"

column3: “Me Want Cookies, Me Want Cookies, Me Want some MORE Orange Cookies. I was visiting family in Washington and went into a store. The bud clerk" not sure if that is what you call them
column4: since it is legal over there.

column2: he recommended Orange Cookies for a great relaxing high. Again
column3: I am visiting family so I wanted to be as HIGH as possible to tolerate my loving family.

column1: Just the smell of sweet citrus calmed me d...”"

column3: “Amazinf smell and taste.. Its a mild but good feeling high" its potent and its taste us out if this world.. I felt relax and the aroma of this us so pleasant.. I was lucky to tries it ar San Bernardino and i got my pack of seeds! alien Orange Cookies rule!”"

“This strain is a mix of orange juice bud X forum cookies . the mix allows the user to feel very alert and pain free 10 stars on both wax and concentrate. The true orange cookies are found at TlcLosangeles.”

“TL;DR: GREAT HIGH, 4/5 taste. I still gave the strain 5* because I think the high is that good.

Gold Coast Premium Nug Run Orange Cookies

I've been able to sample quite a few citrus flavoured strains lately, such as Cali O, Tangie, the parent of this strain, Orange Juice, and Jillybean. If you're in it for the terps, you probably want to stick to something Tangie-related, which produces a much purer orange flavour....”

“I picked up some of this today and wasn't really sure what to expect. As I get home I crack open the bag it was sealed in and the sweet and pungent smell of fresh oranges and dank fill the room. So naturally I sit down, pack a bowl and smoke. It really is a relaxing high, it snowballs so you can't really feel it with the first few hits but before you know it you're sitting there pain-free, happy as can be. I didn't n...”

“Orange Cookies by Sub X - just took my first couple rips from my firefly 2 and Wow! I've tried several citrusy strains before but this was the most fragrant and flavorful. Pure orange on the exhale and super chill. I'm very indica sensitive and can get knocked out quick. Feeling good, introspective and can still function so far. I'm a daily toker, mostly evenings but also before lifting weights. This is a great eveni...”

“I picked up some of this today and wasn't really sure what to expect. As I get home I crack open the bag it was sealed in and the sweet and pungent smell of fresh oranges and dank fill the room. So naturally I sit down, pack a bowl and smoke. It really is a relaxing high, it snowballs so you can't really feel it with the first few hits but before you know it you're sitting there pain-free, happy as can be. I didn't n...”

“First time trying his strain. It is a really great strain to unwind with, def give me an indica sleepy effect. The buds were bright light green with highs of purple running thru it as it was caked it trichomes and you could see the Orange Juice/California Orange genetics. It smells like orange peels and smokes great.”

“I am more of an indica smoker but I tried Orange Cookies (a hybrid leaning to the sativa side) because everyone at work said how great it was.  Well, I was not disappointed at all!  The sativa high crept up on me within 15 minutes of smoking and I felt great. High, senses lit up, and brain and body in a good place.  I felt high without any anxiousness, energized without being hyper.  Soon the Orange Cookie took me to...”

“This strain is grown pretty exclusivley  at TLC Collective, and to correct the description, their orange cookies is Orange Juice x Forum Cookies. This strain is PHENOMENAL. Nothing short of exeptional. This is everyhthing a strain of marijuana should be. Immense beauty of the flowers with a light green, orange and slight hints of purple, to the best aroma I've ever encountered from the cannabis plant. Pure tangerine ...”
“Very Special and Proof of how far we've come in this marijuana culture. FIVE 🌟'S.”

“I vaped orange cookies (90% thc) for my first time smoking this strain. It’s actually my first time vaping THC at all... & I was blown away. I was very relaxed & this helped me sleep at night. When I was awake & moving I was very very happy. 
I am a recovering addict so sleeping through the night is very hard, but with orange cookies I was able to sleep through the night, only waking up about once. When I did wake up...”

“I've been getting pretty lucky this month
Scored some wedding cake and sundae driver and im not even in L.A, im in a state where the Sour reigns lol anyway I scored some orange cookies this time, i was VERY impressed by the smell alone when i cracked open that 3.5, smelled like a bag of orange starburst with a dessert hint to it, smoked some I was dazed n dizzy at first but let it ride for 15 20 minutes and you will ...”
“Mild strain with citrusy aroma. Not as enjoyable as Tangie in the flavor department.”
“Sweet fruity smell of tangerines and oranges. Quite the find of a strain, very hard to find. Amazing hybrid properties, well worth the title it earned at the Cannabis Cup.”

“I vaped orange cookies (90% thc) for my first time smoking this strain. It’s actually my first time vaping THC at all... & I was blown away. I was very relaxed & this helped me sleep at night. When I was awake & moving I was very very happy. 
I am a recovering addict so sleeping through the night is very hard, but with orange cookies I was able to sleep through the night, only waking up about once. When I did wake up...”

“Wow... One of the tastiest strains I've ever puffed. Nice smooth smoke with a surprisingly less pu grant smell when burning than I expected. Beautiful look that breaks apart easily. Definitely a head high that relaxes into the neck and shoulder area leaving you tension-free for a few hours. HIGHLY recommend this.”
“This shit is 🔥 - so dope and smells so so dope - bought an ounce and been nailing it - sometimes I burn it as incense.   So so 🔥”

“When grown right, this strain is a monster. Tightly packed nuggets that are very resinous. The aroma and flavor closely resembles either a tangerine or even old fashioned Sunny Delight.  On flavor/aroma alone, this strain gets 5 stars. 

Upon exhale, I'm greeted with a euphoric cerebral high that is definitely felt behind the eyes. Very uplifting sativa. After a short while, the cerebral high is becomes more relaxed ...”
“Orange Cookies has to be the tastiest bud i've tried so far. I've only spotted it at TLC in Los Angeles, so worth the drive. One of my favorites without a doubt.”
“Probably the best sex strain my wife and I have tried. It is an absolute aphrodisiac for us. Our sex life was great, but this strain kicked it into another gear”
“Possibly my favorite strain for stress, pain, inflammation, and anxiety while remaining functional throughout the day as long as I keep things in moderation.”
“This shit is 🔥 - so dope and smells so so dope - bought an ounce and been nailing it - sometimes I burn it as incense.   So so 🔥”

“The Terpenes in this strain pack such an orange stench, the flavor on the exhale is almost that of a clementine. Super body relieving affects without having the urge to knock out. Not in my top 5 of strains, but definitely a unique strain with potent euphoria.”

“I’m not a fan of GSC or the way it makes me feel, however, this.... is... wonderful. The smell reminds me of a warm cup of kava tea and cinnamon, mixed with orange. It’s refreshing, soothing and the high comes on slow but feels great when it hits. Talkative, happy, relaxed.”

“I picked up 7 grams of this stuff and my friend and I rolled a blunt. We hotboxed the car. Orange cookies was delicious and we were high after just a few hits (unusual). I pulled out a bag of animal crackers and we went to town on them. We also talked about some really amazing conspiracy theories. I really had a great high from smoking orange cookies. My friend J and I had an animal fight night with the animal cracke...”
“This is easily the best strain I have smoked for anxiety personally. I drift into a world of bliss and carefreeness.”
“Great tasty strain. Name sake reflects the aroma and taste. I will get again. It’s very euphoric, uplifting, and relaxing. A solid 5/5.”

“I got Tropicana Cookies, couldn't find on here so this has got to be the closest to description and flavor. love this strain very flavorful and smells great also very relaxing and mellow feeling out of it.”

“My girlfriend and I tried it while lying in bed on a Saturday afternoon, and we were immediately struck by how quickly it diminished our anxiety, something both of us struggle with. This is one of the most obvious characteristics of Orange Cookies. It works to create a buffer between your mind and any negative thoughts that might plague you. 

My girlfriend mentioned that it'd be the ideal strain for going to a party...”

“I got Tropicana Cookies, couldn't find on here so this has got to be the closest to description and flavor. love this strain very flavorful and smells great also very relaxing and mellow feeling out of it.”
“Great tasty strain. Name sake reflects the aroma and taste. I will get again. It’s very euphoric, uplifting, and relaxing. A solid 5/5.”
“This is easily the best strain I have smoked for anxiety personally. I drift into a world of bliss and carefreeness.”

“This is by far my favorite strain I’ve ever tried. I love waking and baking with Orange Cookies because it gives me a really great energy boost, and I feel very patient, and talkative/social which helps start my day off right and keep up with my kids. I deal with anxiety and depression and this strain seems to mellow both of those extremes and brings me back into the middle.”
“As described”
“Considered a top medicine for travel use.”

It is one of those “it tastes just how it smells” strains and I smoked it through a ...”

“Easy going buzz that is very light.  It is a little awkward in that there is not a whole lot of medicinal value aside from a slight mood change.  Did not make me sleepy nor give a jolt to my energy level.  There was a nice light numb feeling in the back of my neck and head for a half hour.  So maybe mild short lived pain relief or mood stabilizer, no munchies, functional, short lived.

The taste was something to note...”
“Surprising weed, i was in a fun,buzzy vibe. Felt very happy.”

“The most intense smelling and tasting strain i have ever had. Bought 7grams and the jar/weed smelled just as strong a week later as it did the day I opened the jar. The taste is out of this world. SubX does it best, they're located out of Bellingham WA.”

The strain itself smells like orange/tangerine citrus but it wasn't as pungent as I thought it would be.  As for the high it self it hits pretty good.  A little cerebral but doesn't give you anxiety for the most part.  Wait about 30 minutes then the indica side kicks in but you don't get tired.  I...”

Mental acuity is decent so it's good for day time use but the relaxing indica effects may have you wanting to just chill and listen to music.”
“Always have a stash - another strain that everyone should be dosed on by the hour.”
“Intense initial rush that gives way to as described. 4 stars on the initial intensity was a little much.”
“Very uplifting & euphoric”
“Fun and bubbly feeling, sociable, and giggly. Slight lightness of body feeling. This is a really happy strain!”

“citrusy taste, definitely recommend 💕”

“Holy shit.... just vaporized this out of my Mighty and it's straight FIRE! 

I was feeling so fatigued, nauseous, stressed, anxious, and had a ridiculous headache. 

Now? I feel energized but not in a I gotta go out and do shit" type of way but I feel like I CAN go do shit if I had to.

column1: Nausea has subsided but still kind of scared to eat. Overall feeling well (:”"

column3: “This is a great nighttime or alone time strain. Although it is a hybrid it feels mostly like an indica- relaxed and glued to the couch. The taste is good- nothing great- but the high is awesome. The only dislike I have of this strain is that it is hard to function socially or get any work/homework/studying done while high. Overall, this is one of my favorite strains to enjoy while on my own.”
“Long lasting body buzz, mild head buzz”
“Tastes like a deeamsicle!”

“If you get a chance to grab some properly grown orange cookies do not pass! This strain has an amazing terp profile and is well balanced to be used during the day without any couch lock. That being said, beware to much indulging with this strain knocked me out, it taste so good I couldn’t stop blazing it!”
“This is a nice strain that falls into my share with the inlaws" group. (Hey
column4: I like my inlaws). It's smooth and easy to smoke
column7: and a nice gentle high. It is a bit of a creeper in my experience. On my first experience with it I took my normal number of puffs
column8: then after not really feeling the effects for about 15 minutes I did another session worth. About 10 minutes later it f...”"

column3: “great taste”
“One or my favorites!”

“Best strain I've tried so far, the perfect combination of a hybrid. Very tasty and delicious flower. One of the dankest weed. The effects are off the charts, that nice cerebral high and uplifting effects combined with a very relaxing body high takes away all stress and depression. I could even study hard while high. Definitely recommend this strain if you haven't tried it already.”

“So sweet & tasty, it's a perfect strain! Very nice body euphoria is felt, yet with a very clean head. Walking can be a challenge right after you consume, but that quickly fades and you're left comfortably buzzed for 3-4 hours. Promotes a healthy appetite, and while you're eating your mind will be in a creative thought process.

One of the top strains of 16/17.”
“satisfy,s me everytime relaxing effect..very tasty oranges..my favorite strain so far..”
“Great smell and taste.  Solid buzz nice body feel.  Did give me dry eyes an a slight headache though.”

“Orange soda is what my first thoughts when I think of think strain. Let me first say that I'm not the biggest fan of GSC strains, but I actually really enjoyed this strain. The flowers were compact frosty light green, coated with deep orange calyxes. The smell is skunky, a sweet citrus, with a bit of nice floral aroma. The flavor is what really appealed to me with this strain. It tastes very much like skunky orange ...”
“i like the taste and aroma...but it was a nice calming buzzzzz....very good to use while in midst of a project... it kept me focused..”

“This is better than gsc's! It's super functional and it made me really happy. In fact I actually enjoyed doing the dishes (& who enjoys that!?). I also made a huge Sunday dinner & it's just me at the moment ;) The come down is when you feel the indica part.”
“Top of the line! King Kush has fresh new delivery. Got to go.”
“Probably the best tasting strain I've had. Connoisseur bud for sure with an excellent complex high. Highly recommended to anybody who loves quality”
“love this shit”

“As soon as I took the first hit *BAM* delicious orangey terps, after the initial orangeyness I can still taste an orange cream soda sorta taste- even after about 30 mins after I smoked! This strain definitely has a hybrid-y feel too it, while I felt a lot of relaxation and sedation, my mind was so clear, alert and crisp it kept me awake, focused, but still very relaxed helped my pain a good amount, migraine GONE, no ...”

“To me it doesn't smell like orange but when you tasted it really  taste like you're eating an orange. The high is pretty relaxing and mild. Helps with nerve pain, neuropathy, arthritis, chronic pain, and anxiety.”
“strong(smoke and high) similar to smoking a blunt”

“Open the bag first whiff it smells a bag of oranges.
It's sooo citrusy it's almost hurts your nose. Lungs get creamed by the citrus in a bong pull. Almost gasp for oxygen, then the citrus sweets kick in. High doesn't last Lonng at all. It's just a tasty strain for morning smoke. Girl Scout is stronger imo.
But definitely worth the money and the change from your go to strain.”
“Great tasting strain 10/10 would recommend. makes you feel relaxed and energized, happy as can be while smoking”
“Nice smooth high with minor appetite side effects. Lasts about an hour, give or take 20 mins. I'd definitely make it my go to if I'm low on cash.”
“This has become my favorite strain. It gives the perfect high everytime, very consistent. Puts you in the perfect mood this is the real deal i love it!”

“Fun and bubbly feeling, sociable, and giggly. Slight lightness of body feeling. This is a really happy strain!”

Too expensive to only be beautiful. 

It does leave a zesty flavour to it in the back of your mouth though.”

“This is a great nighttime or alone time strain. Although it is a hybrid it feels mostly like an indica- relaxed and glued to the couch. The taste is good- nothing great- but the high is awesome. Overall, this is one of my favorite strains to enjoy while on my own.”

“I am more of an indica smoker but I tried Orange Cookies (a hybrid leaning to the sativa side) because everyone at work said how great it was.  Well, I was not disappointed at all!  The sativa high crept up on me within 15 minutes of smoking and I felt great. High, senses lit up, and brain and body in a good place.  I felt high without any anxiousness, energized without being hyper.  Soon the Orange Cookie took me to...”
“It's very upbeat but borders on paranoid and anxious. That dissipates quickly enough but the lead up can be stressful”
“smells like Guava.”

“This strain has the smell and taste of bitter orange peel and skunky fruity botanical scent as well. Marked as a sativa I definitely felt the indica effects to be most present. Sedating and invigorating at the same time I would use this strain for sleeplessness and pain, and does allow mental stimulation for creativity for like drawing or writing music. Very unique and well rounded for an afternoon-evening smoke.”

“nice strain for when you dont want to be super stoned but want a boost in mood.  slight behind the eyes and spinal humming. havent found it to be as flavorful as the review but tastes good.  i smoke diesels and og lineage a lot so i think they make everything else seem less flavorful in comparison.  not a heavy hitting strain.  happy and mellow but not sleepy. not my go to for pain as it doesn't stay prominent in the...”

“Woo Hoo! That seems to be the best way to describe this strain.  Effects came on strong, starting with a super-trippy (and tingly!) head high, which moved into a nice body high.  This strain would be great for doing anything fun... Maybe a big party or a concert (Ozzy Osbourne's Flying High Again" was playing while on this high

It's aroma is a rotten orange peels with an also sweet citrusy smell to it.  One of my buddies said if he had to smoke one bud for the rest of his life it would be Orange Cookies. It rips thru ur skull in a clean way and also leaves you relaxed and feeling nice.”

“In my career" so far
column4: this has been the best strain I have tried. It gives me wicked cerebral effects (in particular
column6: but also has a noticeable body high that dampens any pain. Very very good strain.”"

column3:
“Dense, orange smelling rock hard buds. The scent of this strain is pretty awesome if you're into citrusy fruity strains. The taste on this particular cut was slightly lack luster compared to its aroma. The high comes on strong and the dips into a pretty Stoney, sleepy couch lock. 

Def not my fav, but good bud none the less.”
“Orange goodness non of that tangimal ahit (tangiexanimalcookies) straight gass!”

“I took a half gram dab of orange cookies after a 4 week tolerance break, and I felt as if I was actually tripping on acid.  There was waves going outwards through my body starting in my heart, my vision was distorted for 45 minutes, I felt like I was going to pass out for the first hour (never actually did).  But definitely 2 star don't recommend to a beginner, if you are experienced maybe you would enjoy it more but...”
